title: Sword of Convallaria
tags: Free to Play,JRPG,Tactical RPG,Turn-Based Tactics,Strategy,Turn-Based Strategy,RPG,Lore-Rich,Pixel Graphics,Story Rich,Turn-Based Combat,Multiple Endings,Anime,Drama,1980s,Gambling,1990's,Singleplayer,Retro,Co-op
description: Fantasy Tactical RPG revitalizing the beloved Japanese turn-based & pixel art genre. Collect & train a roster of mercenaries, customize your squad, and use your own strategy to save the nation of Iria. Journey through a world of plot twists where every choice you make will reshape your destiny.
